title: Extreme Movie
summary: Extreme movie is a parody of teen sex comedies.

reviews.content: Best comedy I have seen this year, and I have seem most of them!!!!!!
The name should have been Extremely Horrible Movie, possibly targeted for teens.
A real mixed bag of vignettes, most are just stupid but some of it is funny. The actors seemed to have fun making it. Fans of warped humor will enjoy. Matthew Lillard has a good bit playing himself.

I've seen some awful movies in my day, but I can't remember the last time I absolutely couldn't sit through one. This movie is simply abominable. It's exactly like Kentucky Fried Movie, except without any humor, at least during the first halfI've seen some awful movies in my day, but I can't remember the last time I absolutely couldn't sit through one. This movie is simply abominable. It's exactly like Kentucky Fried Movie, except without any humor, at least during the first half hour or so.
9th grade humor at its best or should I say "at its worst".   It was actually funny at times !   Not a bad way to kill an hour  with this on demand showtime movie.

This Must be one of the Worst movies i have ever seen in my life with actors like Matthew Lillard Jamie Kennedy and Michael Cera you Should be expecting something Funny and Something pretty good But This is No Where Near being good it is aThis Must be one of the Worst movies i have ever seen in my life with actors like Matthew Lillard Jamie Kennedy and Michael Cera you Should be expecting something Funny and Something pretty good But This is No Where Near being good it is a Disgrace to Filmmaking

A movie with Michael Cera and Frankie Muniz?  Count me in!  Who's it written by?  Oh, the writers of 'Not Another Teen Movie.  In that case... The film is not only unfunny and badly made, but the actors are given a terrible script whichA movie with Michael Cera and Frankie Muniz?  Count me in!  Who's it written by?  Oh, the writers of 'Not Another Teen Movie.  In that case... The film is not only unfunny and badly made, but the actors are given a terrible script which ruins their performances and the film-makers mistake  humour with offending people.  To sum up the film, I'll tell you the funniest joke-  Michael Cera tries to rape an old lady.  Yeah, hilarious. Hit anyone who wants to watch this movie, burn every single copy and assassinate the Adam Jay Epstein and Andrew Jacobson!
